title: Brooklyn Brownstone Renovation
titleCn: 布鲁克林褐石建筑翻新
coverImageAltCn: 布鲁克林褐石建筑客厅

overview.body: A four-story 1880s brownstone restored to its historic grandeur while incorporating modern conveniences. The challenge was to honor the building's Victorian bones — original moldings, pocket doors, and fireplaces — while creating a home for contemporary family life.
overview.bodyCn: 一栋四层19世纪80年代的褐石建筑，在融入现代便利设施的同时恢复了其历史风采。挑战在于尊重建筑的维多利亚式骨架——原始装饰线条、推拉门和壁炉——同时为当代家庭生活创造一个家。

gallery.altCn: 带原始壁炉的修复客厅

testimonial.quote: Julia managed to give us both: a home that respects the history of this beautiful building and works for our busy modern family.
testimonial.quoteCn: Julia成功地给了我们两者：一个尊重这座美丽建筑历史的家，同时也适合我们忙碌的现代家庭生活。
testimonial.author: The Park Family

seo.title: Brooklyn Brownstone Renovation — Julia Studio
seo.description: Historic 1880s brownstone renovation in Brooklyn Heights. Classic design preserving Victorian character with modern family living.
